name: Riftshock
description:
Riftshcok is arcade space shooter.  You're allies have lost control and turned against you during an intergalactic jump. 

Either Defend yourself and destroy them all or sacrifice yourself and save them.

Controls

ActionKeyboard/MouseGamepad
MovementW/A/S/DLeft Thumb Stick
ShootLeft Mouse Button
Right Trigger
DashSpace Bar
Left Trigger

*Please ignore the dozens of typos caused by faster than normal typing.

*Made in less than 28 Hours (Power Outages suck)
